name: Ophanimon Falldown Mode
effect: [When Digivolving] If this Digimon has a purple card in its digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon. If this Digimon has a yellow card in its digivolution cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)[On Deletion] You may play 1 purple or yellow level 4 or lower Digimon card from your trash without paying its memory cost.
